Class Polkadot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polkadot

  • public class Polkadot
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class for creating polka dots. It is able to create default red polka dots, or create polka dots of different colors, sizes, and locations.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Nick He, Kevin Liu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Polkadot()
      Default constructor.
      Polkadot(double x, double y, double d, java.awt.Color c)
      Constructor if location, diameterm and color of the polka dot are specified by the user.

      draws the Polkadot on the buffer image

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polkadot

        public Polkadot()
        Default constructor.

      • Polkadot

        public Polkadot(double x,
                double y,
                double d,
                java.awt.Color c)
        Constructor if location, diameterm and color of the polka dot are specified by the user.
        Parameters:
        x - X position of polkadot relative to top left corner
        y - Y Position of polkadot relative to top left corner
        d - Diameter of polkadot
        c - Color of Polkadot

      • jump

        public void jump(int rightEdge,
                 int bottomEdge)
        sets the polka dot's x and y values to a random double between the specified edges.
        Parameters:
        rightEdge - rightmost edge where the user wants a polka dot
        bottomEdge - furthest down where the user wants a polka dot

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics myBuffer)
        draws the Polkadot on the buffer image
        Parameters:
        myBuffer - the graphics buffer used to draw the Polkadots
